Enum BaseActions

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<BaseActions>
      • com.cqblueprints.testing.cq.base.BaseActions
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Comparable<BaseActions>

    public enum BaseActions
extends Enum<BaseActions>
    Provides high level functions for performing complex interactions in AEM.
    Author:
    Diran Samarjian
